#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long n,out; 
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n==1){
		out=0;}
		else if(n%2==0)
		{
			out=( ((n+1)) * ((n/2)-1) )+(n/2);
		}
		else if(n%2==1)
		{
			out=( (n+2)*((n/2)-1) ) + ( ((n+1)/2) + 1 ) ;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",out);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
